title: Roles
summary: Roles and their descriptions at TorontoJS

roles.description: Identify great content for blog posts and work with people to make them happen, from getting permission to cross-post to helping others write their first posts.
Work with the web team to bring past event data onto the site and help develop creative projects like a visual timeline and photo import tools.
Help plan and host the JS Social, one of the most popular events, and contribute to its success.
Organize annual, one-off, or recurring online events.
Manage social accounts and create content to highlight community contributions across platforms like LinkedIn, Meetup.com, Instagram, YouTube, and Twitter.
